metadata.title: CVE-2015-5236 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - negligible
metadata.description: It was discovered that the IcedTea-Web used codebase attribute of the<applet> tag on the HTML page that hosts Java applet in the Same OriginPolicy (SOP) checks. As the specified codebase does not have to match theapplet's actual origin, this allowed malicious site to bypass SOP viaspoofed codebase value.

criterions.comment: icedtea-web package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
